Description.Text: Be among the first to stay in the landmark Titanic Quarter Development, Belfast's first accommodation provider on the historic site where the iconic HMS Titanic was Built. These stunning one, two and three bedroom apartments are situated in the Arc building at the heart of the Titanic Quarter development, Belfast's most prestigious residential and commercial development. The apartments employ the latest in technology including a Jamo multi-room DVD and sound system with control units and output in each room and a full ventilation system with inbuilt heat recovery unit that precludes the need to open your windows. Whether you choose a one, two or three bedroom apartment, youll enjoy a sumptuous sense of space and light with generous ceiling heights and great views from living rooms, balconies and fully glazed extended corner suites. All bathrooms enjoy a long deep bath, with integrated shower, while the en suites benefit from a spacious shower.
Arc building at the heart of the Titanic Quarter development, Belfast's most prestigious residential and commercial development.

Luxury Apartment - Furnished to the highest standard this one bedroom (double) apartment really is a luxury home from home. Complete with balcony off living room, free undercroft parking, Jamo multi-room sound system and internet access on request (free of charge)
Luxury Apartment - Furnished to the highest standard this two bedroom (Sleeps 4) apartment really is a luxury home from home. There is an entrance hall from the main door, allowing for privacy in all your rooms. Complete with Free Undercroft Parking, Jamo multi-room sound system and internet access on request.
